text: wysalwnk ean alhyd- wahu aldam aldhy ysyl min 'arham alnisa' jibillat fi awqat mkhswst-, qul lahum -ayha alnby-: hu 'adhana mstqdhr yadura min yaqrabuh, fajtanibuu jmae alnisa' mdt alhayd hataa ynqte aldm, fa'iidha ainqatae aldm, waghtsln, fjamewhn fi almwde aldhy ahllah allah lkm, wahu alqbl la aldbr. 'iina allah yuhibu eibadih almkthryn min alastghfar waltwbt, wayuhibu eibadih almutatahirin aladhin ybtedwn ean alfawahish walaqdhar
